Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the provision of services to people living with HIV and AIDS
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Provision of services to people living with HIV and AIDS.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.442/A.3355, which would amend the Social Services Law to mandate each local department of social service link persons living with HIV with benefits and services and provide that persons living with HIV who are receiving housing assistance shall not be required to pay more than 30% of household income towards shelter costs.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the provision of services to people living with HIV and AIDS
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Provision of services to people living with HIV and AIDS.

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee
Items.MatterName: Provision of services to people living with HIV and AIDS.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the provision of services to people living with HIV and AIDS
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
